items.name: jusertypeOnActive
items.title: User Type For Active Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the user type that the user should belong to when the subscription is active

items.name: jusertypeOnHold
items.title: User Type For On Hold Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the user type that the user should belong to when the subscription is on hold

items.name: jusertypeOnExpire
items.title: User Type For Expire Subscription
items.tooltip: Determine the user type that the user should belong to when the subscription is expire

items.name: removeFromDefault
items.title: Remove From Default User Group
items.tooltip: Determine if you would like to remove the default user group of the user upon activating the subscription.

items.name: removeFromGroup
items.title: Forcefully Remove Usergroup
items.tooltip: Determine if the system should forcefully remove all of the selected usergroups from the user once the user subscription become active
